pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.1_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.2_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ tīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.3_0: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
